name: Mug Root Beer, 12 Fl Oz Cans, Pack of 18
review: It's a great non alcoholic beverage. But be sure ask the seller the expiration date is at least five months. Mine was only two months. Plus when opening a can the can will get soft or indent. But no loss of carbonation. Although great beverage. Buyer beware also seller

name: Jelly Bellytm Draft Beer Can, 1.75 Oz, Gold
review: The only non alcoholic beer that tastes great I’ve tried. Plus it’s zero alcohol where many beers claim to be alcohol free but have .5 alcohol. It tastes like regular Heineken

name: Heineken 0.0% Non-Alcohol
review: I drink a lot of Bundaberg (to the exclusion of any other soft drinks) and I thought the smaller cans would be handy. Than was true, but I didn't like drinking out of the can and went back to bottles. I've tried a lot of ginger beers, but Bundaberg is the best ever with just the right peppery taste.

name: Flying Cauldron Butterscotch Beer 12 Oz 4 Bottles
review: Hard to find in the grocery store. Helps belly aches and has real ginger in it!!! We love this brand and it tastes soo good! I like the little cans because it’s smaller than the glass bottle size this also comes in.

name: Flying Cauldron Butterscotch Beer 12 Oz 4 Bottles
review: I always expected ginger beer to have a bite to it. A good one is like drinking a ginger snap. I guess they like it differently in Australia. This was like drinking a generic vanilla wafer. Way too mild for me, the price should have been closer to what a watered-down ginger ale tastes.

name: Bundaberg Ginger Beer,
review: The very best thing this product has going for it is that it's not made by Budweiser or Miller or Coors. That applies to all imported NA beer, so after that, it's a simple matter of taste. I happen to like this best, and it's often hard to find in supermarkets, so I get it from Amazon.com.

name: Root beers
review: Not a bad beer at all. Came in 2nd to 00 Heineken, but ahead of every other non-alcoholic beer in the market. Very good, strong beer flavor. But the price is almost the the same as for 00 Heineken, which is a superior beer, and the best tasting NA beer in the market. If I couldn't get 00 Heineken I'd choose this beer.

name: Sprecher ROOT BEER PINT AMBER BOTTLES
review: Hard to find in the grocery store. Helps belly aches and has real ginger in it!!! We love this brand and it tastes soo good! I like the little cans because it’s smaller than the glass bottle size this also comes in.

name: Sprecher ROOT BEER PINT AMBER BOTTLES
review: Used to give old mil and old mil light plenty of business in high school. Glad I’m able to get it in a non alcoholic version now. A pretty good crisp taste like a normal beer. I’ve tried plenty from Bud, Miller, Coors, and Heineken, if you’re into cheap no thrills beers this is a pretty good one. Just wish it was more available in the South.
